title: Support the T-Shirt Hurling Contest!
body: There's a little over a week left to go before the JavaOne t-shirt hurling contest entries are due. Get outside your box and think of some cool way to get t-shirts out to an audience. To spice things up a little I've decided to try an experiment to boost the prize money: there is official t-shirt hurling contest merchandise for sale at cafeshops.com. A portion of the sale price of each article goes into the prize pot. Even if you're not entering, you can at least support it by buying a goofy shirt.
